Anybody here interested in Minecraft? :)
I just open-sourced a small project a started working on in 2011, I call it MCWKT or "Minecraft Web Toolkit".
It's an ASP.NET MVC application that lets you manage a minecraft server and has a few nice features. I've been using to manage a minecraft server I have on an Azure VM that me and a few friends play on :)

https://github.com/hassanselim0/MinecraftWebToolkit

Currently there are a bunch of hard-coded stuff here and there (since I was only making this for myself), but I hope I could change that.
So if anybody here likes Minecraft, give it a try and tell me what you think :)
posts.caption: github.com
posts.description: MinecraftWebToolkit - MCWTK: A Web Interface for managing a Minecraft Server with a few nice features

posts.message: Tesla Motors will make all their products and designs open-source :D
posts.caption: teslamotors.com
posts.description: Yesterday, there was a wall of Tesla patents in the lobby of our Palo Alto headquarters. That is no longer the case. They have been removed, in the spirit of the open source movement, for the advancement of electric vehicle technology.
